analysis.key_quote: Having some certainty in job safety is one of the few benefits of working for the federal government, and this change in policy would give the entire federal workforce the fear that they could be fired at any moment for non-performance related reasons.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of job security and existing protections for federal employees, highlighting concerns about politicization and the integrity of the merit-based system.
